title: Enhancing Data Science Competencies: Learning-Oriented Leadership—Strategies for Practical Implementation in the Field

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more specific activity strategies in daily work contexts to facilitate learning
Learners can analyze two or more constraints hindering learning-oriented leadership practices and propose solutions

Learners design AI-assisted learning strategies using peer feedback (3+ times/week) and role modeling (analysis of two success cases) in mobile microlearning environments. They submit a prototype meeting ≥4 of 5 peer evaluation rubric items.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
